text: Hi Vaibhav, Rohit. I am based in Delhi and run a company which uses Julia for building statistical learning algorithms. What about your guys.

elements.text: Hi Vaibhav, Rohit. I am based in Delhi and run a company which uses Julia for building statistical learning algorithms. What about your guys.

text:
That sounds quite cool, what domain of problems are you developing these algorithms for?
I am a Master's student from IIT (BHU) in Mathematics and Computing and have recently joined Julia Computing as a full-time employee :slightly_smiling_face:
